[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack5-localization-plugin](./webpack5-localization-plugin.md) &gt; [ILocalizationStatsOptions](./webpack5-localization-plugin.ilocalizationstatsoptions.md) &gt; [callback](./webpack5-localization-plugin.ilocalizationstatsoptions.callback.md)

## ILocalizationStatsOptions.callback property

This option is used to specify a callback to be called with the stats data that would be dropped at `localizationStats.dropPath` after compilation completes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
callback?: (stats: ILocalizationStats) => void;
```
